Package es.upm.oeg.cidercl.classifiers.features

Class Summary
AlignerForFeaturesDataGeneration Alignment process for calculating the features that will be used for training the classifier (monolingual case).
AlignerForFeaturesDataGenerationCL Alignment process for calculating the features that will be used for training the classifier (cross-lingual case)
CLESAFeaturesDataCreator Computes CLESA relatedness between the different elements (features) of two ontology entities and stores the results in a structure that will be used for training the classifier.
SkeletonFeaturesFileCreator Class to create the skeleton structure for the files that will contain the data (features) that will be used to train the classifiers.
SoftTFIDFFeaturesDataCreator Computes SoftTFIDF relatedness between the different elements (features) of two ontology entities and stores the results in a structure that will be used for training the classifier.
